segments.text: How do you think should I handle this problem ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You'd just let sleeping dogs lie .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But I'm already in a lot of trouble with my boss .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Anything you say or do might make it worse . Just try to ride out the storm for a while .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She's always bothering me . What should I do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But she always harps on me .
segments.speaker: S1
